Title: align-content
Summary: Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space.

Title: align-items
Summary: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container.

Title: align-self
Summary: Specifies the alignment for selected items inside a flexible container

Title: all
Summary: Resets all properties (except unicode-bidi and direction)

Title: animation
Summary: A shorthand property for all the animation-* properties
Values: CSS Syntax => animation: name duration timing-function delay iteration-count direction fill-mode play-state;

Title: animation-delay
Summary: Specifies a delay for the start of an animation

Title: animation-direction
Summary: Specifies whether an animation should be played forwards, backwards or in alternate cycles.

Title: animation-duration
Summary: Specifies how long an animation should take to complete one cycle.

Title: animation-fill-mode
Summary: Specifies a style for the element when the animation is not playing (before it starts, after it ends, or both).

Title: animation-iteration-count
Summary: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played.

Title: animation-name
Summary: Specifies a name for the @keyframes animation.

Title: animation-play-state
Summary: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused.

Title: animation-timing-function
Summary: Specifies the speed curve of an animation.

Title: backface-visibility
Summary: Defines whether or not the back face of an element should be visible when facing the user.

Title: background
Summary: A shorthand property for all the background-* properties
Example: style="background: lightblue url("img_tree.gif") no-repeat fixed center;"
Values: bg-color bg-image position/bg-size bg-repeat bg-origin bg-clip bg-attachment initial

Title: background-attachment
Summary: Sets whether a background image scrolls with the rest of the page, or is fixed.

Title: background-blend-mode
Summary: Specifies the blending mode of each background layer (color/image).

Title: background-clip
Summary: Defines how far the background (color or image) should extend within an element.

Title: background-color
Summary: Specifies the background color of an element.

Title: background-image
Summary: Specifies one or more background images for an element.

Title: background-origin
Summary: Specifies the origin position of a background image.

Title: background-position
Summary: Specifies the origin position of a background image.

Title: background-repeat
Summary: Sets if/how a background image will be repeated.

Title: background-size
Summary: Specifies the size of the background images.

Title: border
Summary: SA shorthand property for border-width, border-style and border-color.
Example: style="border: 5px solid red;" | style="border: 4px dotted blue;" | style="border: double;"

Title: border-bottom
Summary: A shorthand property for border-bottom-width, border-bottom-style and border-bottom-color.
Example: style="border-bottom: 5px solid red;" | style="border-bottom: 4px dotted blue;" | style="border-bottom: double;"

Title: border-bottom-color
Summary: Sets the color of the bottom border.

Title: border-bottom-left-radius
Summary: Defines the radius of the border of the bottom-left corner.

Title: border-bottom-right-radius
Summary: Defines the radius of the border of the bottom-right corner.

Title: border-bottom-style
Summary: Sets the style of the bottom border.

Title: border-bottom-width
Summary: Sets the width of the bottom border.

Title: border-collapse
Summary: Sets whether table borders should collapse into a single border or be separated.

Title: border-color
Summary: Sets the color of the four borders.

Title: border-image
Summary: A shorthand property for all the border-image-* properties.

Title: border-image-outset
Summary: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box.

Title: border-image-repeat
Summary: Specifies whether the border image should be repeated, rounded or stretched.

Title: border-image-slice
Summary: Specifies how to slice the border image.

Title: border-image-source
Summary: Specifies the path to the image to be used as a border.

Title: border-image-width
Summary: Specifies the width of the border image.

Title: border-left
Summary: A shorthand property for all the border-left-* properties.
Example: style="border-left: 5px solid red;" | style="border-left: 4px dotted blue;" | style="border-left: double;"

Title: border-left-color
Summary: Sets the color of the left border.

Title: border-left-style
Summary: Sets the style of the left border.

Title: border-left-width
Summary: Sets the width of the left border.

Title: border-radius
Summary: A shorthand property for the four border-*-radius properties.

Title: border-right
Summary: A shorthand property for all the border-right-* properties.

Title: border-right-color
Summary: Sets the color of the right border.

Title: border-right-style
Summary: Sets the style of the right border.

Title: border-right-width
Summary: Sets the width of the right border.

Title: border-spacing
Summary: Sets the distance between the borders of adjacent cells.

Title: border-style
Summary: Sets the style of the four borders.

Title: border-top
Summary: A shorthand property for border-top-width, border-top-style and                  border-top-color.

Title: border-top-color
Summary: Sets the color of the top border.

Title: border-top-left-radius
Summary: Defines the radius of the border of the top-left corner.

Title: border-top-right-radius
Summary: Defines the radius of the border of the top-right corner.

Title: border-top-style
Summary: Sets the style of the top border.

Title: border-top-width
Summary: Sets the width of the top border.

Title: border-width
Summary: Sets the width of the four borders.

Title: bottom
Summary: Sets the elements position, from the bottom of its parent element.

Title: box-decoration-break
Summary: Sets the behavior of the background and border of an element at page-break, or, for in-line elements, at                  line-break..

Title: box-shadow
Summary: Attaches one or more shadows to an element.

Title: box-sizing
Summary: Defines how the width and height of an element are calculated: should                  they include padding and borders, or not.

Title: break-after
Summary: Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur                  after the specified element.

Title: break-before
Summary: Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur                  before the specified element.

Title: break-inside
Summary: Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur                  inside the specified element.

Title: caption-side
Summary: Specifies the placement of a table caption.

Title: caret-color
Summary: Specifies the color of the cursor (caret) in inputs, textareas, or any                  element that is editable.

Title: @charset
Summary: Specifies the character encoding used in the style sheet.

Title: clear
Summary: Specifies what should happen with the element that is next to a floating                  element.

Title: clip
Summary: Clips an absolutely positioned element.

Title: color
Summary: Sets the color of text.

Title: column-count
Summary: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into.

Title: column-fill
Summary: Specifies how to fill columns, balanced or not.

Title: column-gap
Summary: Specifies the gap between the columns.

Title: column-rule
Summary: A shorthand property for all the column-rule-* properties.

Title: column-rule-color
Summary: Specifies the color of the rule between columns.
Example: style="column-rule-color: [ Initial value depends on UA ];"

Title: column-rule-style
Summary: Specifies the style of the rule between columns.

Title: column-rule-width
Summary: Specifies the width of the rule between columns.

Title: column-span
Summary: Specifies how many columns an element should span across.

Title: column-width
Summary: Specifies the column width.

Title: columns
Summary: A shorthand property for column-width and column-count.

Title: content
Summary: Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements, to insert generated content.

Title: counter-increment
Summary: Increases or decreases the value of one or more CSS counters.

Title: counter-reset
Summary: Creates or resets one or more CSS counters.

Title: cursor
Summary: Specifies the mouse cursor to be displayed when pointing over an element.

Title: direction
Summary: Specifies the text direction/writing direction.

Title: display
Summary: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed.

Title: empty-cells
Summary: Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table.

Title: filter
Summary: Defines effects (e.g. blurring or color shifting) on an element before the element is                  displayed.

Title: flex
Summary: A shorthand property for the flex-grow, flex-shrink, and the                  flex-basis                  properties.

Title: flex-basis
Summary: Specifies the initial length of a flexible item.

Title: flex-direction
Summary: Specifies the direction of the flexible items.

Title: flex-flow
Summary: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties.

Title: flex-grow
Summary: Specifies how much the item will grow relative to the rest.

Title: flex-shrink
Summary: Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest.

Title: flex-wrap
Summary: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not.

Title: float
Summary: Specifies whether an element should float to the left, right, or not at                  all.

Title: font
Summary: A shorthand property for the font-style, font-variant, font-weight,                      font-size/line-height, and the font-family properties.

Title: @font-face
Summary: A rule that allows websites to download and use fonts other than the "web-safe" fonts.

Title: font-family
Summary: Specifies the font family for text.

Title: font-feature-settings
Summary: Allows control over advanced typographic features in OpenType fonts.

Title: @font-feature-values
Summary: Allows authors to use a common name in font-variant-alternate for feature activated                  differently in OpenType.

Title: font-kerning
Summary: Controls the usage of the kerning information (how letters are spaced).

Title: font-language-override
Summary: Controls the usage of language-specific glyphs in a typeface.

Title: font-size
Summary: Specifies the font size of text.

Title: font-size-adjust
Summary: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs.

Title: font-stretch
Summary: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family.

Title: font-style
Summary: Specifies the font style for text.

Title: font-synthesis
Summary: Controls which missing typefaces (bold or italic) may be synthesized by the browser.

Title: font-variant
Summary: Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font.

Title: font-variant-alternates
Summary: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs associated to alternative names defined in                  @font-feature-values.

Title: font-variant-caps
Summary: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for capital letters.

Title: font-variant-east-asian
Summary: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for East Asian scripts (e.g Japanese and Chinese).

Title: font-variant-ligatures
Summary: Controls which ligatures and contextual forms are used in textual content of the elements it                  applies to.

Title: font-variant-numeric
Summary: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for numbers, fractions, and ordinal markers.

Title: font-variant-position
Summary: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs of smaller size positioned as superscript or                  subscript regarding the baseline of the font.

Title: font-weight
Summary: Specifies the weight of a font.

Title: gap
Summary: A shorthand property for the row-gap and the column-gap properties.

Title: grid
Summary: A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows,                      grid-template-columns, grid-template-areas, grid-auto-rows,                      grid-auto-columns, and the grid-auto-flow properties.

Title: grid-area
Summary: Either specifies a name for the grid item, or this property is a shorthand property for the                  grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end, and                  grid-column-end properties.

Title: grid-auto-columns
Summary: Specifies a default column size.
Values: minmax(min, max) minmax(min, max) minmax(min, max)

Title: grid-auto-flow
Summary: Specifies how auto-placed items are inserted in the grid.

Title: grid-auto-rows
Summary: Specifies a default row size.
Values: minmax(min, max) minmax(min, max) minmax(min, max)

Title: grid-column
Summary: A shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end                  properties.

Title: grid-column-end
Summary: Specifies where to end the grid item.

Title: grid-column-gap
Summary: Specifies the size of the gap between columns.

Title: grid-column-start
Summary: Specifies where to start the grid item.

Title: grid-gap
Summary: A shorthand property for the grid-row-gap and grid-column-gap properties.

Title: grid-row
Summary: A shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end                  properties.

Title: grid-row-end
Summary: Specifies where to end the grid item.

Title: grid-row-gap
Summary: Specifies the size of the gap between rows.

Title: grid-row-start
Summary: Specifies where to start the grid item.

Title: grid-template
Summary: A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns                  and grid-areas properties.

Title: grid-template-areas
Summary: Specifies how to display columns and rows, using named grid items.

Title: grid-template-columns
Summary: Specifies the size of the columns, and how many columns in a grid layout.

Title: grid-template-rows
Summary: Specifies the size of the rows in a grid layout.

Title: hanging-punctuation
Summary: Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box.

Title: height
Summary: Sets the height of an element.

Title: hyphens
Summary: Sets how to split words to improve the layout of paragraphs.

Title: image-rendering
Summary: Specifies the type of algorithm to use for image scaling.

Title: @import
Summary: Allows you to import a style sheet into another style sheet.

Title: isolation
Summary: Defines whether an element must create a new stacking content.

Title: justify-content
Summary: Specifies the alignment between the items inside a flexible container when the items do not                  use all available space.

Title: @keyframes
Summary: Specifies the animation code.

Title: left
Summary: Specifies the left position of a positioned element.

Title: letter-spacing
Summary: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text.

Title: line-break
Summary: Specifies how/if to break lines.

Title: line-height
Summary: Sets the line height.

Title: list-style
Summary: Sets all the properties for a list in one declaration.

Title: list-style-image
Summary: Specifies an image as the list-item marker.

Title: list-style-position
Summary: Specifies the position of the list-item markers (bullet points).

Title: list-style-type
Summary: Specifies the type of list-item marker.

Title: margin
Summary: Sets all the margin properties in one declaration.

Title: margin-bottom
Summary: Sets the bottom margin of an element.

Title: margin-left
Summary: Sets the left margin of an element.

Title: margin-right
Summary: Sets the right margin of an element.

Title: margin-top
Summary: Sets the top margin of an element.

Title: mask
Summary: Hides parts of an element by masking or clipping an image at specific places.

Title: mask-clip
Summary: Specifies the mask area.

Title: mask-composite
Summary: Represents a compositing operation used on the current mask layer with                  the mask layers below it.

Title: mask-image
Summary: Specifies an image to be used as a mask layer for an element.

Title: mask-mode
Summary: Specifies whether the mask layer image is treated as a luminance mask or                  as an alpha mask.

Title: mask-origin
Summary: Specifies the origin position (the mask                  position area) of a mask layer image.

Title: mask-position
Summary: Sets the starting position of a mask layer image (relative to the                  mask position area).

Title: mask-repeat
Summary: Specifies how the mask layer image is repeated.

Title: mask-size
Summary: Specifies the size of a mask layer image.

Title: mask-type
Summary: Specifies whether an SVG <mask> element is treated as a luminance                  mask or as an alpha mask.

Title: max-height
Summary: Sets the maximum height of an element.

Title: max-width
Summary: Sets the maximum width of an element.

Title: @media
Summary: Sets the style rules for different media types/devices/sizes.

Title: min-height
Summary: Sets the minimum height of an element.

Title: min-width
Summary: Sets the minimum width of an element.

Title: mix-blend-mode
Summary: Specifies how an element's content should blend with its direct parent background.

Title: object-fit
Summary: Specifies how the contents of a replaced element should be fitted to the box established by                  its used height and width.

Title: object-position
Summary: Specifies the alignment of the replaced element inside its box.

Title: opacity
Summary: Sets the opacity level for an element.

Title: order
Summary: Sets the order of the flexible item, relative to the rest.

Title: orphans
Summary: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a                  page or column.

Title: outline
Summary: A shorthand property for the outline-width, outline-style, and                  the outline-color properties.

Title: outline-color
Summary: Sets the color of an outline.

Title: outline-offset
Summary: Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge.

Title: outline-style
Summary: Sets the style of an outline.

Title: outline-width
Summary: Sets the width of an outline.

Title: overflow
Summary: Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box.

Title: overflow-wrap
Summary: Specifies whether or not the browser can break lines with long words, if                  they overflow the container.

Title: overflow-x
Summary: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the                  element's content area.

Title: overflow-y
Summary: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the                  element's content area.

Title: padding
Summary: A shorthand property for all the padding-* properties.

Title: padding-bottom
Summary: Sets the bottom padding of an element.

Title: padding-left
Summary: Sets the left padding of an element.

Title: padding-right
Summary: Sets the right padding of an element.

Title: padding-top
Summary: Sets the top padding of an element.

Title: page-break-after
Summary: Sets the page-break behavior after an element.

Title: page-break-before
Summary: Sets the page-break behavior before an element.

Title: page-break-inside
Summary: Sets the page-break behavior inside an element.

Title: perspective
Summary: Gives a 3D-positioned element some perspective.

Title: perspective-origin
Summary: Defines at which position the user is looking at the 3D-positioned element.

Title: pointer-events
Summary: Defines whether or not an element reacts to pointer events.

Title: position
Summary: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or                  fixed).

Title: quotes
Summary: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations.

Title: resize
Summary: Defines if (and how) an element is resizable by the user.

Title: right
Summary: Specifies the right position of a positioned element.

Title: row-gap
Summary: Specifies the gap between the grid rows.

Title: scroll-behavior
Summary: Specifies whether to smoothly animate the scroll position in a scrollable box, instead of a                  straight jump.

Title: tab-size
Summary: Specifies the width of a tab character.

Title: table-layout
Summary: Defines the algorithm used to lay out table cells, rows, and columns.

Title: text-align
Summary: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text.

Title: text-align-last
Summary: Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned                  when text-align is "justify".

Title: text-combine-upright
Summary: Specifies the combination of multiple characters into the space of a single character.

Title: text-decoration
Summary: Specifies the decoration added to text.

Title: text-decoration-color
Summary: Specifies the color of the text-decoration.

Title: text-decoration-line
Summary: Specifies the type of line in a text-decoration.

Title: text-decoration-style
Summary: Specifies the style of the line in a text decoration.

Title: text-decoration-thickness
Summary: Specifies the thickness of the decoration line.

Title: text-indent
Summary: Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block.

Title: text-justify
Summary: Specifies the justification method used when text-align is "justify".

Title: text-orientation
Summary: Defines the orientation of the text in a line.

Title: text-overflow
Summary: Specifies what should happen when text overflows the containing element.

Title: text-shadow
Summary: Adds shadow to text.

Title: text-transform
Summary: Controls the capitalization of text.

Title: text-underline-position
Summary: Specifies the position of the underline which is set using the text-decoration property.

Title: top
Summary: Specifies the top position of a positioned element.

Title: transform
Summary: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element.

Title: transform-origin
Summary: Allows you to change the position on transformed elements.

Title: transform-style
Summary: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space.

Title: transition
Summary: A shorthand property for all the transition-* properties.

Title: transition-delay
Summary: Specifies when the transition effect will start.

Title: transition-duration
Summary: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete.

Title: transition-property
Summary: Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for.

Title: transition-timing-function
Summary: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect.

Title: unicode-bidi
Summary: Used together with the direction property to set or                  return whether the text should be overridden to support multiple languages in the same                  document.

Title: user-select
Summary: Specifies whether the text of an element can be selected.

Title: vertical-align
Summary: Sets the vertical alignment of an element.

Title: visibility
Summary: Specifies whether or not an element is visible.

Title: white-space
Summary: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled.

Title: widows
Summary: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the top of a page                  or column.

Title: width
Summary: Sets the width of an element.

Title: word-break
Summary: Specifies how words should break when reaching the end of a line.

Title: word-spacing
Summary: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text.

Title: word-wrap
Summary: Allows long, unbreakable words to be broken and wrap to the next line.

Title: writing-mode
Summary: Specifies whether lines of text are laid out horizontally or vertically.

Title: z-index
Summary: Sets the stack order of a positioned element.
